job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongResponsibilitiesstrongppbrpulliCreate actionable recommendations and put code into production effecting a large population with cutting edge technology liliCreate Training models evaluating them making sure they are fit for purpose liliDeliver actionable recommendations lili Find and interpret rich data sources manage large amounts of data despite hardware software and bandwidth constraints merge data sources ensure consistency of data sets create visualizations to aid in understanding data build mathematical models using the data and present and communicate the data insightsfindingsnbspliulpbrppbrppstrongRequirements strongppbrpulli Knowledge and experience in building and analyzing linear regression logistic regression generalized linear models and time series models lili Experience in converting business problems into statistical problems building models to solve the statistical problem then use the models to develop business recommendations to solve the business problem lili Knowledge of optimization techniques and application to business problems lili Experience in pulling data from multiple sources cleaning the data and preparing the data for analysis lili Experience in using a structure workflow in their problem solving lili Experience in using Git to manage model versions lili Experience with R and Pythonlili Three plus years of applying the above in a business environment liulpbrppbrppPriceSenz is an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion age sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin or disabilityp
